column13: It is collected manually and investigated by three individuals and all the results of these independent examinations are collected and the intersection of them, that means the common decisions, are selected and put in the dataset. Class decisions are made by examining username, background image, profile image, follower and friends count, description of the account, number of tweets, and content of the tweets. Totally, there are 501 fake and 499 real account data is collected.
